p:
Initiation of carfilzomib therapy is routinely done with a step‐up dose from 20 mg/m 2 to target dose (56 mg/m 2 in CARDAMON). To reduce the risk of infusion reactions and adverse events, such as thrombotic microangiopathy occurring on resuming therapy after a break,
13 an urgent safety measure was implemented. Where carfilzomib maintenance was delayed for >4 weeks, treatment was to be restarted at 20 mg/m 2 on day 1 of the new cycle before escalating to the full 56 mg/m 2 or last tolerated dose.
